title: Abomination

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On full moons, a random townie is compelled to visit you. (Redirected from their original target, not controlled)
- At night, you gain 1 stress for each visitor, or lose all stress if not visited.
- If you have 3 stress, you transform into a hideous monster, rampaging at your own house and cleaning all visitors, then resetting to 0 stress.
- If you are attacked, you rampage, then return to 0 stress.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
